remarks: If two sequences converge to each other, they converge to the same limit.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Dec-2005.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
statement:
2clim.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
2clim.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
2clim.3 $e |- ( ph -> G e. V ) $.
2clim.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` k ) e. CC ) $.
2clim.6 $e |- ( ph -> A. x e. RR+ E. j e. Z A. k e. ( ZZ>= ` j ) ( abs ` ( ( F ` k ) - ( G ` k ) ) ) < x ) $.
2clim.7 $e |- ( ph -> F ~~> A ) $.
2clim $p |- ( ph -> G ~~> A ) $.
$d A j k $.
$d F j k x $.
$d G j k x $.
$d M j $.
$d Z j k x $.
$d j k ph $.
